section.title: Updating the Lenya website

ul.li: For further information see the Wiki page CocoonWebsiteUpdate
Checkout the cocoon-site module from svn.apache.org
You can do that by using svn co https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/cocoon/site/site/lenya/ lenya-website
Copy the pages from $LENYA_HOME/build/site to cocoon-site/site/lenya
Create and copy the Javadoc (ant javadocs, ant install, Copy from $TOMCAT_HOME/webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs/docs-new/resources/html/apidocs to cocoon-site/site/lenya)

section.p:
There is a cron job on minotaur which will do 'svn update' every 12 hours (see ~thorsten/bin/mycrontab).
